name: Gzipped OneDrive Event Log
summary: An ODLGZ file is a OneDrive event log (.ODL file) that has been compressed using GNU zip (gzip) compression. It contains a list of events that occurred while a user was using the desktop version of OneDrive. Microsoft can use the log an OLDGZ file contains to troubleshoot any synchronization issues that occur as a result of a user editing a file offline.
